languages.text: "Пока хозяин кроит плоть, я добываю ему новый материал. Ведаю делами. Приглядываю... Я приглядываю..." {n}Голос чудовища становится спокойнее с каждым новым словом, выравнивается в близкий к нормальному тембр. Какая-то механика в теле монстра оживает, с шипением впрыскивает нечто по прозрачным трубкам, уходящим в плоть. Спустя мгновение введенный химикат заставляет гиганта взреветь с прежней слепой яростью.{/n} "Я слежу!"

"I get new material while the master cuts. I manage his business. I look after... I look..." {n}The monster's voice keeps growing calmer with every word, approaching a normal pitch. Some mechanism inside the hulk's body springs to life with a hiss and injects something into the clear tubes gnawing at its flesh. A moment later, the chemical makes the giant roar with the same blind rage as before.{/n} "I watch!"
languages.original_text: "Пока хозяин кроит плоть, я добываю ему новый материал. Ведаю делами. Приглядываю... Я приглядываю..." {n}Голос чудовища становится спокойнее с каждым новым словом, выравнивается в близкий к нормальному тембр. Какая-то механика в теле монстра оживает, с шипением впрыскивает нечто по прозрачным трубкам, уходящим в плоть. Спустя мгновение введенный химикат заставляет гиганта взреветь с прежней слепой яростью.{/n} "Я слежу!"

A moment later, the chemical makes the giant roar with the same blind rage as before.{/n} "I watch!"

languages.text: 「マスターが切り刻んでいる間、俺が新しい素材を手に入れる。マスターの仕事を管理しているんだ。俺はマスターの…世話を…」{n}怪物の声は言葉を重ねるごとに穏やかになり、通常の声色に戻っていく。巨大な体の中にある何らかのメカニズムがシューという音と共に活性化し、その肉をむしばんでいる透明なチューブに何かを注入する。一瞬の後、巨体は、先ほどと同じような盲目的な怒りに咆哮する怪物へと変わる。{/n}「見ているぞ！」
languages.original_text: "I get new material while the master cuts. I manage his business. I look after... I look..." {n}The monster's voice keeps growing calmer with every word, approaching a normal pitch. Some mechanism inside the hulk's body springs to life with a hiss and injects something into the clear tubes gnawing at its flesh. A moment later, the chemical makes the giant roar with the same blind rage as before.{/n} "I watch!"

traits.locale_text: 「マスターが切り刻んでいる間、俺が新しい素材を手に入れる。マスターの仕事を管理しているんだ。俺はマスターの…世話を…」{n}怪物の声は言葉を重ねるごとに穏やかになり、通常の声色に戻っていく。巨大な体の中にある何らかのメカニズムがシューという音と共に活性化し、その肉をむしばんでいる透明なチューブに何かを注入する。一瞬の後、巨体は、先ほどと同じような盲目的な怒りに咆哮する怪物へと変わる。{/n}「見ているぞ！」
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: “主人手术的时候，我负责寻找新的材料。我负责管理他的生意，我照看……照看……”{n}怪物的声音越来越平静，越来越接近正常的声音。突然之间，怪物体内的一部分机械装置发出嘶嘶声，轰动起来，将某种药剂顺着透明的管子注入了怪物体内。片刻之后，在化学物质的作用下，怪物高声咆哮起来，像之前一样陷入了狂暴的怒火之中。{/n}“我照看一切！”
languages.original_text: "I get new material while the master cuts. I manage his business. I look after... I look..." {n}The monster's voice keeps growing calmer with every word, approaching a normal pitch. Some mechanism inside the hulk's body springs to life with a hiss and injects something into the clear tubes gnawing at its flesh. A moment later, the chemical makes the giant roar with the same blind rage as before.{/n} "I watch!"

traits.locale_text: “主人手术的时候，我负责寻找新的材料。我负责管理他的生意，我照看……照看……”{n}怪物的声音越来越平静，越来越接近正常的声音。突然之间，怪物体内的一部分机械装置发出嘶嘶声，轰动起来，将某种药剂顺着透明的管子注入了怪物体内。片刻之后，在化学物质的作用下，怪物高声咆哮起来，像之前一样陷入了狂暴的怒火之中。{/n}“我照看一切！”
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: «Yo consigo material nuevo mientras el amo corta. Gestiono sus negocios. Cuido... cuido...». {n}La voz del monstruo se vuelve más relajada con cada palabra y se acerca a un tono normal. Un mecanismo en el interior de su cuerpo se activa con un siseo e inyecta algo en los tubos transparentes que perforan su carne. Un instante después, los químicos hacen que gigante ruja con la misma furia ciega que antes.{/n} «¡Vigilo!».
languages.original_text: "I get new material while the master cuts. I manage his business. I look after... I look..." {n}The monster's voice keeps growing calmer with every word, approaching a normal pitch. Some mechanism inside the hulk's body springs to life with a hiss and injects something into the clear tubes gnawing at its flesh. A moment later, the chemical makes the giant roar with the same blind rage as before.{/n} "I watch!"

traits.locale_text: «Yo consigo material nuevo mientras el amo corta. Gestiono sus negocios. Cuido... cuido...». {n}La voz del monstruo se vuelve más relajada con cada palabra y se acerca a un tono normal. Un mecanismo en el interior de su cuerpo se activa con un siseo e inyecta algo en los tubos transparentes que perforan su carne. Un instante después, los químicos hacen que gigante ruja con la misma furia ciega que antes.{/n} «¡Vigilo!».
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: "Ich besorge neues Material, während der Meister schneidet. Ich führe seine Geschäfte. Ich kümmere mich um ... Ich kümmere mich ..." {n}Die Stimme des Monsters wird mit jedem Wort immer ruhiger, nähert sich langsam einem normalen Ton an. Irgendein Mechanismus im Körper des Hünen erwacht mit einem Zischen zum Leben und injiziert etwas in die durchsichtigen Röhren, die an seinem Fleisch nagen. Einen Augenblick später sorgt die Chemikalie dafür, dass der Riese wieder mit derselben blinden Wut wie zuvor brüllt.{/n} "Ich sehe zu!"
languages.original_text: "I get new material while the master cuts. I manage his business. I look after... I look..." {n}The monster's voice keeps growing calmer with every word, approaching a normal pitch. Some mechanism inside the hulk's body springs to life with a hiss and injects something into the clear tubes gnawing at its flesh. A moment later, the chemical makes the giant roar with the same blind rage as before.{/n} "I watch!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich besorge neues Material, während der Meister schneidet. Ich führe seine Geschäfte. Ich kümmere mich um ... Ich kümmere mich ..." {n}Die Stimme des Monsters wird mit jedem Wort immer ruhiger, nähert sich langsam einem normalen Ton an. Irgendein Mechanismus im Körper des Hünen erwacht mit einem Zischen zum Leben und injiziert etwas in die durchsichtigen Röhren, die an seinem Fleisch nagen. Einen Augenblick später sorgt die Chemikalie dafür, dass der Riese wieder mit derselben blinden Wut wie zuvor brüllt.{/n} "Ich sehe zu!"
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: « J'apporte les matériaux et le maître coupe. Je gère ses affaires. Je veille sur... Je veille... » {n}La voix du monstre se fait de plus en plus calme à chaque mot jusqu'à se rapprocher d'une intonation normale. Dans son corps, un mécanisme s'active avec un sifflement et injecte quelque chose dans les tubes transparents qui lui transpercent la peau. Un instant plus tard, le géant se remet à grogner avec rage.{/n} « Je veille ! »
languages.original_text: "I get new material while the master cuts. I manage his business. I look after... I look..." {n}The monster's voice keeps growing calmer with every word, approaching a normal pitch. Some mechanism inside the hulk's body springs to life with a hiss and injects something into the clear tubes gnawing at its flesh. A moment later, the chemical makes the giant roar with the same blind rage as before.{/n} "I watch!"

traits.locale_text: « J'apporte les matériaux et le maître coupe. Je gère ses affaires. Je veille sur... Je veille... » {n}La voix du monstre se fait de plus en plus calme à chaque mot jusqu'à se rapprocher d'une intonation normale. Dans son corps, un mécanisme s'active avec un sifflement et injecte quelque chose dans les tubes transparents qui lui transpercent la peau. Un instant plus tard, le géant se remet à grogner avec rage.{/n} « Je veille ! »
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: "Efendim kesip biçerken ben yeni materyal toplarım. İşleriyle ben ilgilenirim. Ben bakarım... Ben..." {n}Canavarın sesi, söylediği her bir kelimeyle gitgide sakinleşerek normal bir tona yaklaşıyor. Devasa yaratığın bedenindeki mekanizmalardan birkaçı, bir tıslamayla birlikte harekete geçerek etini kemiren şeffaf tüplere bir şey enjekte ediyor. Ardından bu kimyasal, devasa yaratığın eskiden olduğu gibi körü körüne öfke saçan bir kükreme koparmasına neden oluyor.{/n} "Ben izlerim!"
languages.original_text: "I get new material while the master cuts. I manage his business. I look after... I look..." {n}The monster's voice keeps growing calmer with every word, approaching a normal pitch. Some mechanism inside the hulk's body springs to life with a hiss and injects something into the clear tubes gnawing at its flesh. A moment later, the chemical makes the giant roar with the same blind rage as before.{/n} "I watch!"

traits.locale_text: "Efendim kesip biçerken ben yeni materyal toplarım. İşleriyle ben ilgilenirim. Ben bakarım... Ben..." {n}Canavarın sesi, söylediği her bir kelimeyle daha da sakinleşerek normal bir tona yaklaşıyor. Devasa yaratığın bedenindeki mekanizmalardan birkaçı, bir tıslamayla birlikte harekete geçerek etini kemiren şeffaf tüplere bir şey enjekte ediyor. Ardından bu kimyasal, devasa yaratığın körü körüne öfke saçan eski hâlindeki gibi kükremesine neden oluyor.{/n} "Ben izlerim!"
traits.speaker: WrackServant
